contents.text: Welcome to Yodlee, transforming financial services with seamless access to data through our powerful API solutions.
For developer support and access to our API documentation, press 1.
For API onboarding and integration assistance, press 1.
Please hold while we connect you to a technical specialist for developer support.

navigationGoals: Help me integrate Yodlee’s API into our platform quickly
I’m developing a budgeting app for fellow veterans and need help integrating your API
I’d like to speak with a specialist about integrating Yodlee’s REST API and accessing the developer SDK documentation.
I need help setting up Yodlee data access for my budgeting app.
I need help integrating Yodlee’s API into my data analysis pipeline and understanding the authentication flow.

contents.text: For reporting data feed issues, press 2.
Please hold while we retrieve your data feed details.

navigationGoals: Report and fix an issue with our API data feed
My data feed stopped syncing my benefit transactions and I need it fixed
I need to troubleshoot missing transaction records in my Yodlee data feed.
My account isn’t showing recent transactions—please help me retrieve my data feed.
I’m missing transaction records in my data feed and need assistance troubleshooting the issue.

contents.text: For enterprise and partnership inquiries, press 2.
For bank and financial institution solutions, press 1.
Please hold while we connect you to our enterprise solutions team.

navigationGoals: Discuss enterprise partnership options for our bank
I run a veteran support nonprofit and want to explore an enterprise partnership
I want to discuss enterprise licensing and partnership options for Yodlee’s bank solutions.
I’d like to find out if my small community bank can become a Yodlee partner.
I want to explore a partnership to integrate Yodlee solutions with my university’s finance research lab for institutional banking data.

contents.text: For billing and account management, press 2.
Please hold while we connect you to billing support.

navigationGoals: Resolve a billing discrepancy on my Yodlee account
I need to update the payment method on my enterprise subscription
I need billing support to review my Yodlee account usage charges and invoices.
I’m confused about a charge on my account and need help understanding my invoice.
I’d like to update my billing information and discuss upgrading my developer account to a paid plan.
